messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 264
messages.msgSnippet: Hi My name is Julie and we live in Florida. I unschool my daughter who is almost 8 years old. We are enjoying unschooling and meeting other people who
messages.messageBody:
Hi
My name is Julie and we live in Florida. I unschool my daughter who is almost 8 years old. We are enjoying unschooling and meeting other people who unschool. I choose to unschool mainly because of my work schedule and my daughter does not do well with strict structure. She enjoys reading and math. Writing is a real hassel but I figure it will come eventually.
ARe there any other unschoolers in the Ocala area of Florida?
Our family wishes you and your family the best of hoilidays
Julie and Daughter Carrissa
